body_html:
There should be an actual error from tensorflow in your logs somewhere. I would first suspect that it can't find CUPTI library

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH"
body_text:
There should be an actual error from tensorflow in your logs somewhere. I would first suspect that it can't find CUPTI library
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH"
body:
There should be an actual error from tensorflow in your logs somewhere. I would first suspect that it can't find CUPTI library

`export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH"
`
